price: (Na mmom Ɔmaa no yεε Nwoma a emu nsεm no) tene pεpεεpε, sεdeε ͻde asotwe denden a efri Ne hͻ no bεbͻ (nnipa) kͻkͻ, na ͻbεhyԑ agyidiefoͻ no a wͻredi dwumapa no nso bᴐ sε, wͻn wͻ akatuapa a,
arabic: قَيِّمٗا لِّيُنذِرَ بَأۡسٗا شَدِيدٗا مِّن لَّدُنۡهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qayyiman liyundhira basan shadīdan min ladun'hu wayubashira al-mu'minīna alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran ḥasanan
